# Webbed
## Overview
**Webbed:** When creating this augmentation, choose one face of the wall. A 10-foot-thick *[[Web (Spell)|web]]* (as the spell) extends out from the chosen side.

Any damaged or burned section of webs automatically reforms 24 hours later.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; *Prerequisites:* [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Web (Spell)|web]]; Market Price:* 3,000 gp.
